function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative outcomes from the imposition of quarantine-related anger","Impact":"Increased risk of social unrest and non-compliance with quarantine measures","Mitigation":"Implementing effective communication strategies and mental health support for those in quarantine","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and mental health apps","People":"Individuals in quarantine, general public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Loneliness and boredom from social isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of depression and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Providing virtual social activities and mental health support services","Technologies":"Video conferencing, online support groups","People":"Individuals in quarantine, isolated communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Psychological distress due to quarantine and isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of long-term psychological issues and trauma","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted mental health interventions and support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"Children, families, horse owners in quarantine","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
